mapper.select: /* bidNotice.getBidStatCodeList */ SELECT SUB_CODE , CODE_NM FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'BID_STAT_CODE' AND CODE_REFRNONE = 'Y' ORDER BY CODE_ORDR

/* bidNotice.getBidNoticeMngStatCnt */ SELECT ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN BID_STTUS_CODE = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS BDNG_SCHDL_CNT , ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN BID_STTUS_CODE = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS BDNG_PRGRS_CNT , ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN BID_STTUS_CODE = '30' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS BDNG_DDLN_CNT , ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN BID_STTUS_CODE = '33' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS BDNG_CLCNT_CNT , ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN BID_STTUS_CODE = '11' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS BDNG_WTNG_CNT , ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN BID_STTUS_CODE = '31' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS BDNG_SUCS_CNT , ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN BID_STTUS_CODE = '32' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS BDNG_PSTPN_CNT , ISNULL(COUNT(BID_PBLANC_ID) , 0) AS BDNG_ALL_CNT FROM BD_BID_BAS WHERE 1=1 AND ISNULL(DELETE_AT , 'N') = 'N'
AND BID_PBLANC_ID like '%' + #{bidPblancId} + '%'
AND CONVERT(DATETIME , dbo.fn_convertDate(BDDPR_END_DT , 'bo')) >= CONVERT( DATE , #{startDate})
AND CONVERT(DATETIME , dbo.fn_convertDate(BDDPR_END_DT , 'bo')) <= DATEADD( DAY , 1 , CONVERT(DATE , #{endDate}))
